@Java_Guru wrote:

if(singleCombat() && !pl2.underAttack || !inSafezone() && !pl2.inSafezone() && pcombat != -1) { MageAttackIndex = playerIndexx+1; if(MageHit(playerIndexx)) { AttackMage(playerIndexx); mageTimer = 20; } else { stillgfx(339, server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx].absY, server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx].absX); } } else { sendMessage("This player is in a safe zone !"); }

item.title: Random Error
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

I was adding non multi pk areas and got

client.java:20520: 'else' without 'if' else ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

I checked everything I added.

if(singleCombat() && pl2.underAttack == false || !inSafezone() && !pl2.inSafezone() && pcombat != -1) { { MageAttackIndex = playerIndexx+1; if(MageHit(playerIndexx)) { AttackMage(playerIndexx); mageTimer = 20; } else { stillgfx(339, server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx].absY, server.playerHandler.players[playerIndexx].absX); } } else { sendMessage("This player is in a safe zone !"); } Hehe.
